result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lionel Victo Johnson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lionel Victo Johnson not in court, in custody.  Attorney Travis Schwantes in court for Lionel Victo Johnson.  Attorney Daniel T Flaherty in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense requests Final Pretrial and Jury Trial dates. Any witness lists, special jury instructions, and motion in limine to be filed by the final pretrial date. Any other motions and notice of alibi must be filed by the final pretrial. Court orders case adjourned for final pretrial and jury trial in Branch 4.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for January 3, 2023 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Lionel Victo Johnson appeared by video, in custody in HOC.  Attorney Travis Schwantes in court in person for Lionel Victo Johnson. Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court in person for the State of Wisconsin. 
Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Detective T. Mason. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 04.
Scheduling conference scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Commissioner and reporter has been updated today for 09/9/22 entry.

Defendant Lionel Victo Johnson not in court, in custody. Attorney Travis Schwantes appeared for defendant.   Attorney Daniel T Flaherty appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State's motion to modify bail argued..  The Court finds probable cause and amends bail to $10,000. cash. Turn over to Justice Point for Level 5 Supervision.   Absolutely No Contact with A L or JLW.  Absolutely no contact with any weapons.  This matter remains calendared in Br 4.  mn
Notice of State's Objection to Bail Set in ICCR and Request for Immediate Relief.

Court ordered no contact with A.L and J.L.W.
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Lionel Victo Johnson appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Travis Schwantes appeared by video for Lionel Victo Johnson.  Prosecuting attorney Gregg Herman appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Shelton, Branch 40. Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings. Defense motion to dismiss count 3 due to lack of probable cause. State argues motion. Court denied motion to dismiss.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Lionel Victo Johnson
Current: 2408 W Burleigh Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206 United States  (Effective: 08-12-2022)
Prior: 4327 North 26th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53209
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.

Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
